thread.title: FTSE 100 movers: Easyjet falls as Greece, Asia worries drag index lower
thread.title_full: FTSE 100 movers: Easyjet falls as Greece, Asia worries drag index lower

title: FTSE 100 movers: Easyjet falls as Greece, Asia worries drag index lower
text:
2,320.00 -99.000 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - The FTSE 100 fell 1.6% as political turmoil in Greece and further falls in Asia drove the sell off. The index blue-chip shares was down 103.8 points to 6,264 at 1435 BST. 
Pharmaceuticals firm Shire (Xetra: S7E.DE - news ) led the fallers, down 4% while Easyjet (Other OTC: EJTTF - news ) flew 3.4% lower. 
Standard Chartered (HKSE: 2888.HK - news ) shares continued their fall, down 3%. The bank is suffering from its exposure to Asian markets and increasing bad loans. 
Among the leading stocks in positive territory were Royal mail (LSE: RMG.L - news ) , up 1.27%. 
Fresnillo (Other OTC: FNLPF - news ) remained in favour, up 0.66% as investors sought a safe haven in the silver miner as metals prices rise. 
FTSE 100 - Risers Royal Mail (RMG) 476.70p +1.27% Fresnillo (Amsterdam: FN6.AS - news ) (FRES) 689.00p +0.66% Johnson Matthey (LSE: JMAT.L - news ) (JMAT) 2,705.00p +0.52% Sage Group (LSE: SGE.L - news ) (SGE) 510.50p +0.29% GKN (GKN (LSE: GKN.L - news ) ) 290.80p +0.28% Burberry Group (Other OTC: BBRYF - news ) (BRBY) 1,420.00p +0.21% British Land Company (BLND) 860.00p +0.17% Land Securities Group (LAND) 1,301.00p +0.15% Relx plc (LSE: REL.L - news ) (REL) 1,066.00p +0.09% FTSE 100 - Fallers easyJet (EZJ) 1,644.00p -3.41% Shire Plc (SHP) 4,908.00p -3.29% RSA Insurance Group (RSA) 491.40p -3.08% Standard Chartered (STAN) 789.80p -3.07% Prudential (Amsterdam: PD8.AS - news ) (PRU (HKSE: 2378-OL.HK - news ) ) 1,429.00p -2.92% Carnival (CCL) 3,266.00p -2.74% Old Mutual (Other OTC: ODMTY - news ) (OML) 199.40p -2.73% Aberdeen Asset Management (Other OTC: ABDNF - news ) (ADN) 317.10p -2.70% Hikma Pharmaceuticals (LSE: HIK.L - news ) (HIK) 2,354.00p -2.69% Schroders (SDR) 2,786.00p -2.49%
